info.name: OneDark++
info.description: An edit of OneDark by by Zion Z3W (zion3w). Changes were quick and dirty, intended to fix some glaring issues.
info.additionalInfo: An edit of OneDark by by Zion Z3W (zion3w). It hadn't been updated since 2019, and there were some changes to the website that made it look not-pretty. Specifically, things like the navbar at the top, certain inline elements, code blocks, and so on. I did some quick and dirty edits. I could take a stab at this one day to make it better, but for now, I'll keep it as is, as it works, and it doesn't kill my eyes! v1: Initial "release". There are some outstanding issues, mainly on the main website (search box is black text on dark textbox. Ugly. Also some strange highlighting on search results which is readable but.... my eyes. I'll fix it at some point, unless someone gets to it first!
